722990f-a.folder: Rivington Street & Pitt Street, Manhattan, NY
722990f-a.text:
199-215 Rivington Street, south side and Pitt, between
Pitt and Ridge, showing P.S. #4.

Board of Education, N.Y.C.
Neg # 714

732407f-a.text:
